item.title: Ukrainians are sharing hacks online on how to survive winter power cuts - NPR
item.description: Ukrainians are sharing hacks online on how to survive winter power cuts NPRHere in One Kyiv Apartment Building, They Are Freezing—but Not Giving Up The Wall Street JournalRussian attacks on Ukraine kill 1 and wound 31 people ahead of second day of peace talks ABC NewsRussia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,431 Al JazeeraRussian strike on Ukraine’s Kyiv leaves 1,330 buildings still without heat, mayor says Reuters
